2015 saha 2016di aarthikaye durwala saha dushitha kalamanakarithwaya nisa shri lanka rupiyale agaya dawantha lesa kada watima osse rate ho rajya sampathwalata kisidu bhauthika agayak ekathu kirimak nomathiwa rajya naya bara wadi wu nisa sidukarana lada paduwa 2015di rupiyal biliyana 285kda, 2016 wasaredi rupiyal biliyana 141kda wu bawa maha banku nila warthawalin heli wi atha.

handinwima: shri lankawa thula ghathanaya wu madhyawedin (2004 - 2010) nikmagiyawun pilibanda mathakaya “mage ratehi nidahasa yanu aathmaya pisa hamana mudu pawanallakata wadi yamaki eya, ape sama thula ka wadunu nirbhitha bhawaya da we” - gothamalanu kiwi ooto rene kastijo lankawe wathman palaka sabhagayehi niyamaka eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya aandu balaya himi karagaththe 2004 aprel masayedi ya.
honda hal walata kali hal, sudu kala saththwa aahara hal ekathu karanawa.

kandayam 12k tharaga wadina loka kusalana sudusukam labime tharagawaliyata danatamath shri lankawa samaga honkon kandayam aasiyawen da, spanynyaya saha jarmaniya yuropayen da, namibiyawa saha ugandawa aprikawen da tharaga kirimata niyamitha athara ithiri kandayam idiriyedi pawathwena ooshaniya sewans, aajentina sewans saha kodew dupath sewans tharagawali atharin thora gane.

pradarshana welawa paswaru 6.00taya.sinhala subhawitha githa sahithyayata anupameya nirmanashili dayakathwayak ha mehewarak itu kala, ada apa athara nomathi madawala es.rathnayaka surin ge geya pada rachana pilibanda keti wiwaranayak ha ethuman sihikirime uthsawayak me masa 14 angaharuwada sawasa 3.00ta kolambaa jathika pusthakala ha pralekhana sewa mandala shrawanagaraye di pawathwe.ohu wisin dashaka kihipayakata pera rachitha githa prabandha sangrahaya fast pablishin (prayiwat) limitad nawa prakashanayak lesa dorata wadima ha madawala rathnayaka suringe asuthunwana janma dinaya sihi kirimath mehi di siduwe.

tharabarukama ewani awasthawaladi mahath badhawak wiya hakiya.me bawa watahagath nepalaye kathmandu aganuwara pradhana polis pradhanihu tharabarukama mandimata yoga wyayama upayogi karaganimata thiranaya kara aththaha.tharabaru polis niladharin yogi wyayamawala yedima aniwarya we.me tharabarukama hethukotagena polis niladharin nishkriya charitha bawata pathwi athi bawa pawasana usas polis niladharihu siyaluma udara mahatha niladharin me wyayamawala yedima athyawashya bawa da pawasathi.kathmandu nagarayen arambaunu mema kriyawaliya nepalaya pura pawathina polis sthanawalada kriyathmaka karanu labana athara eka thana hindagena paminili liwime karyaye yedi sitina polis niladharinta meya mahath prashnayak wanu athayi apeksha kere.beljiyame sedeljem pradeshaye ekthara margayaka jiwathwu janathawa hitihatiyema kosu idal wani upakarana sahithawa mahamangata basse para athugamata nowe.mahath kalabalayakin para pura diwagiya pirisa kosu idal upayogi karagaththe para pura wati thibu mudal ekathukara ganimatayi.kisidu hawak huwak nomathiwa thibu me gammanayata mebandak siduwuye hitihatiye kadawatunu salli wassak hethuweni.
